QuestData.Title: The Titans' Trove
QuestData.Description: As the second defender falls to the ground, a chest appears in the back of the chamber. Could this be what they were protecting?
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Trove of the Watchers.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Inspect the Trove of the Watchers within the Tomb of the Watchers in the Badlands.
